channel.title: Wanted: Sham Rock and Stark Moonlight
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Wanted: Sham Rock and Stark Moonlight" - Trading for one each of a Sham Rock and Stark Moonlight.

item.title: Re: Wanted: Sham Rock and Stark Moonlight
Re: Wanted: Sham Rock and Stark Moonlight
item.content:encoded: I've got one of each. I'll give you both for the Moonlight, if that's okay?

item.title: Re: Wanted: Sham Rock and Stark Moonlight
item.content:encoded:
Have a Stark Moonlight

Would be looking for Hourglases/Timespheres

item.title: Re: Wanted: Sham Rock and Stark Moonlight
item.content:encoded: No longer looking for a Sham Rock, but if you want to trade the Stark Moonlight for something, that'd be great.

item.title: Re: Wanted: Sham Rock and Stark Moonlight
item.content:encoded: I've got 5 Crystal Lens. At the moment, I don't have any other gems aside from a Sham Rock (obviously not trading) and a Sharpening Stone.

item.title: Re: Wanted: Sham Rock and Stark Moonlight
item.content:encoded: I have a Stark Moonlight. I can get a sham rock by Thursday. How many gems and crystal lenses do you have?

item.title: Wanted: Sham Rock and Stark Moonlight
item.content:encoded:
As the title says, I want one Sham Rock and one Stark Moonlight to get Floating on Air so that I can complete the Wastelands. I have lots of items I'd be willing to let go of, including a Reversing Hourglass, Rotating Timesphere, Monochrome Pheromone, and an assortment of Wastelands items like Crystal Lens, Threadbare Robes, an Indestructible Thread, etc. A few other items up for grabs as well, including 60 Silver Petals and 6 Powerful Potions.

Please leave a reply here with what you have and what you want in exchange. Thank you.
